name: soar-language-support
description: Language server client for use with the Soar Language Server

soar.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

soar.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

soar.languageServer.enabled.description: Specifies whether the language server should be used. When enabled the extension will provide code completions and linting, otherwise just syntax highlighting. Might require a reload to apply.

soar.languageServer.executablePath.description: Absolute path to an external Soar Language Server executable. Leave blank to use the built-in executable. If you aren't developing the language server itself, you probably don't need this.

soar.renderHoverMarkdown.description: Specifies whether the language server should display comments as markdown. If false, comments will render as plain text.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: rm -rf ./soar-language-server && (cd ../../ && ./gradlew installShadowDist) && cp -r ../../build/install/soar-language-server-shadow ./soar-language-server && npm run compile
